metadata.Description: Groups of people who are socially, economically, or politically disadvantaged and face barriers to accessing resources and opportunities.

marginalized communities.Description: Marginalized communities employ renewable energy technologies to meet their energy needs and reduce reliance on fossil fuels.
Marginalized communities collaborate with local governments to implement sustainable energy projects and policies.
Marginalized communities support energy access programs that provide clean energy solutions and resources.
Marginalized communities administer energy efficiency initiatives to reduce energy consumption and promote sustainable practices.
Marginalized communities measure energy poverty to identify areas in need of clean energy solutions and support.
Marginalized communities align their energy initiatives with the Sustainable Development Goals to promote sustainable and inclusive development.
Marginalized communities are an instance of energy access challenges that require targeted interventions and support.
